snippet: Producer prices rose 0.1 percent as food costs increased.
abstract: Labor Department reports that the producer price index rose by 0.1 percent in June, the first rise in four months.
lead_paragraph: Producer prices rose 0.1 percent as food costs increased.

headline.seo: For 1st Time in Four Months, Producer Prices Rise
headline.main: For 1st Time in Four Months, Producer Prices Rose in June
headline.print_headline: For 1st Time in Four Months, Producer Prices Rose in June
